EmailTemplate.description: Registration email for Trade Community users
EmailTemplate.name: Trade Community - Registration
EmailTemplate.subject: Complete your ITA Community Registration
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {!Receiving_User.FirstName},
Thank you for taking the time to register with the International Trade Administration (ITA) Community. You now have access ITA's family of websites including:
- Export.gov - PrivacyShield.gov - SelectUSA.gov - Stopfakes.gov
Username: {!Receiving_User.Username}
To complete your registration, please follow this link or cut and paste into a new window: {!Community_Url}
You will also receive a welcome email with more information on resources, benefits of being a registered user, and additional contact information for our community.
Enjoy the community!
